akn:section.akn:heading: National clearinghouse for information relating to child abuse

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment The Secretary shall through the Department, or by one or more contracts of not less than 3 years duration let through a competition, establish a national clearinghouse for information relating to child abuse and neglect.
